name: Firenvim
description: A webextension to turn Firefox into a Neovim client.

scripts.build: ((cargo build --release && (unlink ~/bin/firenvim ; cp target/release/firenvim ~/bin)) & webpack && cp src/native_manifest.json $HOME/.mozilla/native-messaging-hosts/firenvim.json && tslint --fix --project .) || true

author: glacambre
